      public void resetSystem()
      Resets the VelibSystem by creating new empty lists for docking stations, users, and street bikes.

    • assignNewRegularStation

      public void assignNewRegularStation(double[] gpsCord, int nSlots, double percentOfVacant, double percentOfElectrical)
      Assigns a new RegularStation to the VelibSystem with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      gpsCord - the GPS coordinates of the station
      nSlots - the total number of parking slots at the station
      percentOfVacant - the percentage of vacant slots at the station
      percentOfElectrical - the percentage of electrical bikes at the station

    • assignNewPlusStation

      public void assignNewPlusStation(double[] gpsCord, int nSlots, double percentOfVacant, double percentOfElectrical)
      Assigns a new PlusStation to the VelibSystem with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      gpsCord - the GPS coordinates of the station
      nSlots - the total number of parking slots at the station
      percentOfVacant - the percentage of vacant slots at the station
      percentOfElectrical - the percentage of electrical bikes at the station

    • generateStationMap

      public void generateStationMap(int nRegularStations, int nPlusStations, int nSlotsPerStation, double percentOfVacant, double percentOfElectrical, double maxX, double maxY)
      Generates a map of docking stations with the specified number of regular stations and plus stations, and assigns slots and bikes to each station based on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      nRegularStations - the number of regular stations to generate
      nPlusStations - the number of plus stations to generate
      nSlotsPerStation - the number of slots per station
      percentOfVacant - the percentage of vacant slots for each station
      percentOfElectrical - the percentage of electrical bikes for each station
      maxX - the maximum value for the x-coordinate
      maxY - the maximum value for the y-coordinate

    • generateUserList

      public void generateUserList(int nNonSub, int nVlibreUser, int nVmaxUser, double maxX, double maxY)
      Generates a list of users with the specified number of non-subscribers, Vlibre users, and Vmax users. The users are randomly assigned GPS coordinates based on the specified maximum coordinates.
      Parameters:
      nNonSub - the number of non-subscribers to generate
      nVlibreUser - the number of Vlibre users to generate
      nVmaxUser - the number of Vmax users to generate
      maxX - the maximum value for the x-coordinate
      maxY - the maximum value for the y-coordinate

    • addStreetBike

      public void addStreetBike(Bicycle b)
      Adds a street bike to the Velib system.
      Parameters:
      b - the bicycle to add

    • removeStreetBike

      public void removeStreetBike(Bicycle b)
      Removes a street bike from the Velib system.
      Parameters:
      b - the bicycle to remove

    • createUseCaseSystem

      public static VelibSystem createUseCaseSystem()
      Creates a use case system with a predefined configuration. The system includes 10 regular stations, 10 plus stations, 10 slots per station, 40% vacant slots, 30% electrical bikes, and a maximum coordinate value of 10.
      Returns:
      the created VelibSystem instance

    • searchUserById

      public User searchUserById(int id)
      Searches for a user in the Velib system based on the user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to search for
      Returns:
      the found user
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no user matching the ID was found

    • searchStationById

      public DockingStation searchStationById(int id)
      Searches for a docking station in the Velib system based on the station ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the station to search for
      Returns:
      the found docking station
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no station matching the ID was found

    • searchBicycleByGPS

      public Bicycle searchBicycleByGPS(double[] gpsCord)
      Searches for a bicycle in the Velib system based on the GPS coordinates. The search is performed on both street bikes and bikes in docking stations.
      Parameters:
      gpsCord - the GPS coordinates to search for
      Returns:
      the found bicycle
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no bicycle was found at the given coordinates

    • leastOccupiedSort

      public void leastOccupiedSort()
      Sorts the list of docking stations in ascending order based on the least occupied criteria.

    • mostUsedSort

      public void mostUsedSort()
      Sorts the list of docking stations in descending order based on the most used criteria.

      Returns a string representation of the Velib System.
